attributes.action: Include positive antibody test results for unvaccinated on Covid Passports
attributes.additional_details: Natural immunity has been proven to be more effective and longer lasting than vaccine immunity. If the governments aim is to protect the vulnerable, then the unvaccinated and naturally immune pose no threat to public safety and as such should be prioritised on Covid Passports
attributes.background: Provide free antibody tests to ALL that have recovered from covid and allow that data to be a valid reason to travel and attend domestic events through the covid passport.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, making a similar request, which you might like to sign:

Recognise immune response to Covid-19 in the Covid pass: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600576
